#count.label: #count
#count.documentation: Returns the cardinality of the instantiations of Vars satisfying Conj

#sum.label: #sum
#sum.documentation: Returns the sum over the first variable in Vars for instantiations satisfying Conj

#min.label: #min
#min.documentation: Returns the minimum value of Vars satisfying Conj

#max.label: #max
#max.documentation: Returns the maximum value of Vars satisfying Conj

#times.label: #times
#times.documentation: Returns the product of Vars satisfying Conj
